results.name: Expansion of Product_{k>=1} (1 + x^(2*k-1))^(2*k-1)/(1 + x^(2*k))^(2*k).
link: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..2000
mathematica: nmax = 60; CoefficientList[Series[Product[(1 + x^(2*k-1))^(2*k-1)/(1 + x^(2*k))^(2*k), {k, 1, nmax}], {x, 0, nmax}], x] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Apr 15 2017 *)
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Apr 15 2017
